item.content:encoded:
One In A Melon Classroom Valentine’s Day Card

Hot Deals! One In A Melon Classroom Valentine’s Day Card – Valentines Day Cards Popular One In A Melon Classroom Valentine’s Day Card help you save during this period One In A Melon Classroom Valentine’s Day Card There are many featuresShare a sweet wish Valentine’s Day with these cute watermelon classroom valentines. Fun design in soft watercolors features watermelon slices and hearts in pink and green, with "you’re one in a melon" in the center. Personalize with your child’s name along the bottom. Open space at the top for hand writing each recipient’s name. Price:$1.74

Hot Deals! One In A Melon Classroom Valentine’s Day CardHot PRice: ($1.74)
